title: Purity
description: A new start. A new command. But revenge is a dish best served cold. A deadly catastrophe in one of the outer systems brings Kitt Ashton back into service. Faced with a skeleton crew of misfits as well as a new and untried ship, Ashton sails forth to do battle. But all is not well with his new command and the new Captain finds himself fighting not only an invisible enemy, but treachery from deep within the organisation.When the truth is out, will Ashton manage to save the day, as well as the lives of thousands of innocent colonists, or has he gone too far? A very British space adventure!
author: Leona Grace
